ygData.subject: Re: Correction....
ygData.msgSnippet: It works wonderfully. Go to say an orc camp with 2 orcs. Make one sad then quickly draw the other away by attacking it. The sad one stays put. If you are quick
ygData.messageBody:
It works wonderfully.

Go to say an orc camp with 2 orcs. Make one sad then quickly draw
the other away by attacking it. The sad one stays put. If you are quick
about it you can make a couple and maybe even 3 sad. It wears off quickly
so you need to be fast. This is in comparison to how you usually would
have to take on both orcs (or 3 or 4 even) at once.

It doesnt do anything from a pvp perspective but is a neat parlor trick
to give people "A deep sense of loss" when they least expect it.

Berk Half-Elven
Rallos Zek

> Let's settle an debated issue while we are at it. I don't believe
> the Level
> 8 song works, at least that's what I have been hearing. All it does is say
> "A Skeleton Looks Sad" without actually slowing him down (which I believe
> is what it was supposed to do). Can anyone speak authoritatively
> to whether
> it indeed does work?
>
> -Musil
>

> >From: "Michael Meadows" <meadows@...>
> >
> >Fenidune, if you take the boat to Butcherblock, look for
> Paralto...I will be

> >songs. Be sure to bring plenty of money though! I just bought

> >
> > Paralto
